LanguageData.Beauty.degreeDatas.beautiful.label: beautiful
LanguageData.Beauty.degreeDatas.beautiful.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is exceptionally beautiful, with an exotic-yet-familiar facial structure and an arresting gaze. People are attracted to [PAWN_objective] before [PAWN_pronoun] even opens [PAWN_possessive] mouth.
LanguageData.Beauty.degreeDatas.pretty.label: pretty
LanguageData.Beauty.degreeDatas.pretty.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a pretty face, which predisposes people to like [PAWN_objective].
LanguageData.Beauty.degreeDatas.ugly.label: ugly
LanguageData.Beauty.degreeDatas.ugly.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is somewhat ugly. This subtly repels others during social interactions.
LanguageData.Beauty.degreeDatas.staggeringly_ugly.des: [PAWN_nameDef] is staggeringly ugly. [PAWN_possessive] face looks like a cross between a drawing by an untalented child, a malformed fetus in a jar of formaldehyde, and a piece of modern art. Others must exert conscious effort to look at [PAWN_objective] while conversing.
LanguageData.DrugDesire.degreeDatas.chemical_fascinat: [PAWN_nameDef] is utterly fascinated with chemical sources of enjoyment. Consuming recreational drugs will create a good mood, while abstaining will lead to increasing frustration over time and possibly drug binges. [PAWN_pronoun] will ignore directives to not use recreational drugs, and will consume more than a normal person.
LanguageData.DrugDesire.degreeDatas.chemical_interest: [PAWN_nameDef] has an unusual interest in chemical sources of enjoyment. Consuming recreational drugs will create a good mood, while abstaining will lead to increasing frustration over time and possible drug binges. [PAWN_pronoun] will ignore directives to not use recreational drugs, and will consume more than a normal person.
LanguageData.DrugDesire.degreeDatas.teetotaler.label: teetotaler
LanguageData.DrugDesire.degreeDatas.teetotaler.descri: [PAWN_nameDef] abhors the idea of gaining pleasure from chemicals. [PAWN_pronoun] strictly avoids alcohol and recreational drugs.
LanguageData.Immunity.degreeDatas.superimmune.label: super-immune
LanguageData.Immunity.degreeDatas.superimmune.descrip: [PAWN_nameDef] has a naturally powerful immune system. [PAWN_pronoun] will gain immunity much faster than a normal person would, and can survive illnesses that would kill others.
LanguageData.Immunity.degreeDatas.sickly.label: sickly
LanguageData.Immunity.degreeDatas.sickly.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has an awful immune system. [PAWN_pronoun] gets sick more often than usual, frequently with illnesses that nobody in the colony has been afflicted by.
[PAWN_nameDef] has an easy time staying on-task and focused, and gets things done much faster than the average person.
[PAWN_nameDef] is a natural hard worker and will finish tasks faster than most.
LanguageData.Industriousness.degreeDatas.lazy.label: lazy
LanguageData.Industriousness.degreeDatas.slothful.des: [PAWN_nameDef] loves idleness and hates anything productive. [PAWN_pronoun] moves slowly and rarely stays focused on a task.
LanguageData.NaturalMood.degreeDatas.sanguine.label: sanguine
LanguageData.NaturalMood.degreeDatas.sanguine.descrip: [PAWN_nameDef] is just naturally upbeat about [PAWN_possessive] situation, pretty much all the time, no matter what it is.
LanguageData.NaturalMood.degreeDatas.optimist.label: optimist
LanguageData.NaturalMood.degreeDatas.optimist.descrip: [PAWN_nameDef] is naturally optimistic about life. It's hard to get [PAWN_objective] down.
LanguageData.NaturalMood.degreeDatas.pessimist.label: pessimist
LanguageData.NaturalMood.degreeDatas.pessimist.descri: [PAWN_nameDef] tends to look on the bad side of life.
LanguageData.NaturalMood.degreeDatas.depressive.label: depressive
LanguageData.NaturalMood.degreeDatas.depressive.descr: [PAWN_nameDef] is perenially unhappy. [PAWN_pronoun] has trouble sustaining a good mood even when everything is fine.
LanguageData.Nerves.degreeDatas.ironwilled.label: iron-willed
LanguageData.Nerves.degreeDatas.ironwilled.descriptio: [PAWN_nameDef]'s will is an iron shield. [PAWN_pronoun] keeps going through thick and thin, when others broke down long before.
LanguageData.Nerves.degreeDatas.steadfast.label: steadfast
LanguageData.Nerves.degreeDatas.steadfast.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is mentally tough and won't break down under stresses that would crack most people.
LanguageData.Nerves.degreeDatas.nervous.label: nervous
LanguageData.Nerves.degreeDatas.volatile.label: volatile
LanguageData.Nerves.degreeDatas.volatile.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is on a hair-trigger all the time. [PAWN_pronoun] is the first to break in any tough situation.
LanguageData.Neurotic.degreeDatas.neurotic.label: neurotic
LanguageData.Neurotic.degreeDatas.neurotic.descriptio: [PAWN_nameDef] likes to have things squared away. [PAWN_pronoun] will work harder than most to attain this state of affairs, but [PAWN_possessive] nerves can get the better of [PAWN_objective].
LanguageData.Neurotic.degreeDatas.very_neurotic.label: very neurotic
LanguageData.Neurotic.degreeDatas.very_neurotic.descr: [PAWN_nameDef] feels constantly nervous about everything that has to get done. [PAWN_pronoun] will work extremely hard to attain this state of affairs, but [PAWN_possessive] nerves can easily get the better of [PAWN_objective].
LanguageData.PsychicSensitivity.degreeDatas.psychical: [PAWN_nameDef]'s mind is like a psychic tuning fork. [PAWN_pronoun] is extremely sensitive to psychic phenomena.
[PAWN_nameDef]'s mind is unusually sensitive to psychic phenomena.
[PAWN_nameDef]'s mind is psychically out of tune with others. [PAWN_pronoun] isn't as affected by psychic phenomena.
[PAWN_nameDef]'s mind works on a psychic frequency different from everyone else. [PAWN_pronoun] just isn't affected by psychic phenomena.
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracy.degreeDatas.careful_sho: [PAWN_nameDef] takes more time to aim when shooting. [PAWN_pronoun] shoots less often than others, but with more accuracy.
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracy.degreeDatas.triggerhapp: Pew! Pew! Pew! [PAWN_nameDef] just likes pulling the trigger. [PAWN_pronoun] shoots faster than others, but less accurately.
LanguageData.SpeedOffset.degreeDatas.slowpoke.label: slowpoke
LanguageData.SpeedOffset.degreeDatas.slowpoke.descrip: [PAWN_nameDef] is always falling behind the group whenever [PAWN_pronoun] goes anywhere.
LanguageData.SpeedOffset.degreeDatas.fast_walker.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] likes to be where [PAWN_pronoun]'s going. [PAWN_pronoun] walks quicker than most people.
LanguageData.SpeedOffset.degreeDatas.jogger.label: jogger
LanguageData.SpeedOffset.degreeDatas.jogger.descripti: [PAWN_nameDef] always moves with a sense of urgency - so much so that others often fail to keep up.
